paper.title: Woflan 2.0: a Petri-net-based workflow diagnosis tool

paper.venue: Applications and Theory of Petri Nets
paper.abstract: Workflow management technology promises a flexible solution facilitating the easy creation of new business processes and modification of existing ones. Unfortunately, most of todayu0027s workflow products allow for erroneous processes to be put in production: these products lack proper verificationmechanisms in their process-definition tools for the created or modified processes. This paper presents the workflow diagnosis tool Woflan, which fills this gap. Using Petri-net based techniques, Woflan diagnoses process definitions before they are put into production. These process definitions can be imported from commercial workflow products. Furthermore, Woflan guides the modeler of a workflow process definition towards finding and correcting possible errors.
